doc.field: - Shr profit two cts vs profit two cts Net profit 216,000 vs 265,000 Revs 1.7 mln vs 1.4 mln Year Shr profit four cts vs loss two cts Net profit 528,000 vs loss 290,000 Revs 5.9 mln vs 5.5 mln NOTE:1986 net includes realized investment gains of 3,000 dlrs in year. 1985 4th qtr and year includes realized investment gains of 16,000 and 35,000 dlr respectively.
